values.title: Bill Keane
values.desc: Yesterday is history. tomorrow is a mystery today is a gift of God which is why we call it the present

values.title: Stephenie Meyer
values.desc: I like the night. Without the dark we'd never see the stars

values.title: William Faulkner
values.desc: You cannot swim for new horizons until you have courage to lose sight of the shore

values.title: Anonymous
values.desc: And now these three remain faith, hope and love. But the greatest of these is love

values.title: Margaret Mitchell
values.desc: Lifes under no obligation to give us what we expect

values.title: Alexander Pope
values.desc: Blessed is he who expects nothing for he shall never be disappointed

values.title: Kalu Ndukwe Kalu
values.desc: The things you do for yourself are gone when you are gone. but the things you do for others remain as your legacy

values.title: Markus Zusak
values.desc: Maybe everyone can live beyond what theyre capable of

values.title: Jos N Harris
values.desc: Tears shed for another person are not a sign of weakness They are a sign of a pure heart

values.title: John Guare
values.desc: It's amazing how a little tomorrow can make up for a whole lot of yesterday

values.title: Roy T Bennett
values.desc: Never lose hope Storms make people stronger and never last forever

values.title: Pablo Neruda
values.desc: You can cut all the flowers but you cannot keep Spring from coming

values.title: Maxine Hong Kingston
values.desc: In a time of destruction create something
